pullRequest.title: add tool types
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #54
Adds forge's tool type system. Tested with this mod

+package net.minecraftforge.common;
+
+import java.util.Map;
+import java.util.regex.Pattern;
+
+import com.google.common.collect.Maps;
+
+public final class ToolType {
+	private static final Pattern VALID_NAME = Pattern.compile("[^a-z_]"); //Only a-z and _ are allowed, meaning names must be lower case. And use _ to separate words.
+	private static final Map<String, ToolType> values = Maps.newHashMap();

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Glitch <glitchieproductionsofficial@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: This should be moved to a shared module so that block / blockstate extensions can access it too. It might be silly having a single-class module, but I think that's a cleaner solution than eg. making extensions-block depend on extensions-item.

commit.message:
Move ToolType class to its own subproject

Use HashMap constructor instead of Maps method
